title: üîç Pain Point Research - 6:00 AM
content:
PAIN POINT RESEARCH (6 AM)

[Searched Reddit r/Basketball, r/Coaching, r/Youth_Sports and Twitter/X for youth basketball coaching pain points]

CRON JOB OUTPUT SUMMARY:
Generated pain point research findings this morning. Research topics included:
- Player tracking and measurement challenges
- Player evaluation and recruiting clarity
- Data visibility vs. gut feel decisions
- Performance metrics and improvement tracking

Top pain points identified and passed to Lead Scoring team.
Full research available to Sales and Content teams.

Status: ‚úÖ Complete - Ready for 6:30 AM Lead Scoring stage
